mapper.select: select id, subject_id, category_id, label_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted from subject_mapping where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into subject_mapping(subject_id, category_id, label_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{subjectId}, #{categoryId}, #{labelId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into subject_mapping(subject_id, category_id, label_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.subjectId}, #{entity.categoryId}, #{entity.labelId}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into subject_mapping(subject_id, category_id, label_id, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.subjectId}, #{entity.categoryId}, #{entity.labelId}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update subject_id = values(subject_id), category_id = values(category_id), label_id = values(label_id), created_by = values(created_by), created_time = values(created_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update subject_mapping
subject_id = #{subjectId},
category_id = #{categoryId},
label_id = #{labelId},
created_by = #{createdBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
